com.salimov.yurii.service.search

Class SearchServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.service.search.SearchServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchService

    @Service
 @ComponentScan(basePackages="com.salimov.yurii.service")
public class SearchServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements SearchService
    The class of the service layer, implements a set of methods for search for content on the site.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yurii.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    CategoryService, ArticleService, CompanyService, UserService, MainMVFabric, ClientMVFabric
